00035 strVec Reflection::list(string cwd)
00036 {
00037         FILE *pipe_fp;
00038         string command;
00039         strVec files;
00040         command = "ls -F1 "+cwd+"|grep '.h'";
00041         cout << "\nCommand:" << command << flush;
00042         if ((pipe_fp = popen(command.c_str(), "r")) == NULL)
00043         {
00044                 printf("pipe open error in cmd_list\n");
00045                 return files;
00046         }
00047         char t_char;
00048         string fileName;
00049         while ((t_char = fgetc(pipe_fp)) != EOF)
00050         {
00051                 if(t_char!='\n')
00052                 {
00053                         stringstream ss;
00054                         ss << t_char;
00055                         string temp;
00056                         ss >> temp;
00057                         fileName.append(temp);
00058                 }
00059                 else if(fileName!="")
00060                 {
00061                         boost::replace_first(fileName,"*","");
00062                         if(fileName.find("~")==string::npos)
00063                         {
00064                                 files.push_back(cwd+"/"+fileName);
00065                                 cout << "\nlist for file" << (cwd+"/"+fileName) << "\n" << flush;
00066                         }
00067                         fileName = "";
00068                 }
00069         }
00070         pclose(pipe_fp);
00071         return files;
00072 }
00073 
00074 void trimSpaces(string& str)
00075 {
00076     // Trim Both leading and trailing spaces
00077     size_t startpos = str.find_first_not_of(" \t"); // Find the first character position after excluding leading blank spaces
00078     size_t endpos = str.find_last_not_of(" \t"); // Find the first character position from reverse af
00079 
00080      // if all spaces or empty return an empty string
00081      if(( string::npos == startpos ) || ( string::npos == endpos))
00082      {
00083          str = "";
00084      }
00085     else
00086          str = str.substr( startpos, endpos-startpos+1 );
00087 
00088 }
00089 
00090 void Reflection::collectInfo(string data,string flag)
00091 {
00092         trimSpaces(data);
00093         if(flag=="public")
00094                 this->pub.push_back(data);
00095         else if(flag=="protected")
00096                 this->pro.push_back(data);
00097         else if(flag=="private")
00098                 this->pri.push_back(data);
00099 }
00100 
00101 bool Reflection::generateClassInfo(string className)
00102 {
00103         this->pub.clear();this->pri.clear();this->pro.clear();
00104         this->classN="";this->baseClassN="";this->bcvisib="";
00105         string data;
00106         //className += ".h";
00107         ifstream infile;
00108         cout << "Reading from the file" << endl;
00109         //className = "/home/sumeet/workspace/weblib/" + className;
00110         infile.open(className.c_str());
00111         string flag = "";
00112         boost::regex e1,e2;
00113 
00114         if(infile.is_open())
00115         {
00116                 bool classdone = false;
00117                 bool start = false;
00118                 bool classset = false;
00119                 bool commstrts = false;
00120                 size_t tes;
00121                 int cnt = 0;
00122 
00123                 //e1.assign("\\t+");
00124                 e2.assign("\\s+");
00125                 while(getline(infile, data))
00126                 {
00127                         //data = boost::regex_replace(data, e1, "", boost::match_default | boost::format_all);
00128                         data = boost::regex_replace(data, e2, " ", boost::match_default | boost::format_all);
00129                         classset = false;
00130                         if((tes=data.find("/*"))!=string::npos)
00131                         {
00132                                 commstrts = true;
00133                                 if((tes=data.find("*/"))!=string::npos)
00134                                         commstrts = false;
00135                         }
00136                         else if((tes=data.find("*/"))!=string::npos)
00137                         {
00138                                 commstrts = false;
00139                         }
00140                         else if((tes=data.find("//"))!=string::npos)
00141                         {
00142                                 commstrts = false;
00143                         }
00144                         else if(!commstrts)
00145                         {
00146                                 if((tes=data.find("template"))!=string::npos)
00147                                         return false;
00148                                 if(data.find("friend")!=string::npos)
00149                                         continue;
00150                                 if((tes=data.find("class"))!=string::npos && !classdone)
00151                                 {
00152                                         strVec results;
00153                                         boost::replace_first(data,":","");
00154                                         boost::replace_first(data,"class ","");
00155                                         if((tes=data.find("{"))!=string::npos)
00156                                         {
00157                                                 start = true;
00158                                                 cnt += 1;
00159                                         }
00160                                         boost::replace_first(data,"{","");
00161                                         boost::replace_first(data,":","");
00162                                         boost::iter_split(results, data, boost::first_finder(" "));
00163                                         this->classN = results.at(0);
00164                                         boost::replace_all(this->classN," ","");
00165                                         if(results.size()==3)
00166                                         {
00167                                                 this->bcvisib = results.at(1);
00168                                                 boost::replace_all(this->bcvisib," ","");
00169                                                 this->baseClassN = results.at(2);
00170                                                 boost::replace_all(this->baseClassN," ","");
00171                                                 //cout << results.size() << flush;
00172                                         }
00173                                         classdone = true;
00174                                         classset = true;
00175                                         //boost::iter_split(results, data, boost::first_finder(": "));
00176                                 }
00177                                 else if((tes=data.find("{"))!=string::npos && !start)
00178                                 {
00179                                         start = true;
00180                                         boost::replace_first(data,"{","");
00181                                         cnt += 1;
00182                                 }
00183                                 if(start && !classset && data!="")
00184                                 {
00185                                         if((tes=data.find("{"))!=string::npos)
00186                                         {
00187                                                 cnt += 1;
00188                                         }
00189                                         else if((tes=data.find("}"))!=string::npos)
00190                                         {
00191                                                 cnt -= 1;
00192                                         }
00193                                         else if(cnt==0)
00194                                                 break;
00195                                         else if(cnt==1)
00196                                         {
00197                                                 if((tes=data.find("public"))!=string::npos)
00198                                                         flag = "public";
00199                                                 else if((tes=data.find("protected"))!=string::npos)
00200                                                         flag = "protected";
00201                                                 else if((tes=data.find("private"))!=string::npos)
00202                                                         flag = "private";
00203                                                 else
00204                                                 {
00205                                                         if(flag=="")
00206                                                                 flag = "private";
00207                                                         collectInfo(data,flag);
00208                                                 }
00209                                         }
00210                                 }
00211                         }
00212                 }
00213         }
00214         infile.close();
00215         if(this->pub.size()>0 || this->pri.size()>0 || this->pro.size()>0)
00216                 return true;
00217         else
00218                 return false;
00219 }

00221 
00222 bool Reflection::generateClassInfoFromDD(string alldata)
00223 {
00224         string data;
00225         string flag = "";
00226         stringstream ss;
00227         ss << alldata;
00228         while (getline(ss, data))
00229         {
00230                 size_t tes;
00231                 if ((tes = data.find("class")) != string::npos)
00232                 {
00233                         strVec results;
00234                         boost::replace_first(data,":","");
00235                         boost::iter_split(results, data, boost::first_finder(" "));
00236                         this->classN = results.at(1);
00237                         if(results.size()>3)
00238                         {
00239                                 this->bcvisib = results.at(2);
00240                                 this->baseClassN = results.at(3);
00241                                 //cout << results.size() << flush;
00242                         }
00243                         //boost::iter_split(results, data, boost::first_finder(": "));
00244                 }
00245                 else if ((tes = data.find("}")) != string::npos)
00246                         break;
00247                 else if ((tes = data.find("public")) != string::npos)
00248                         flag = "public";
00249                 else if ((tes = data.find("protected")) != string::npos)
00250                         flag = "protected";
00251                 else if ((tes = data.find("private")) != string::npos)
00252                         flag = "private";
00253                 else
00254                 {
00255                         if (flag == "" && data != "{")
00256                                 flag = "private";
00257                         collectInfo(data, flag);
00258                 }
00259         }
00260         //cout << pub.size() << pri.size() << pro.size() << flush;
00261         if (this->pub.size() > 0 || this->pri.size() > 0 || this->pro.size() > 0)
00262                 return true;
00263         else
00264                 return false;
00265 }

00267 string Reflection::updateClassDefinition(string className, bool file)
00268 {
00269         string refDef,typedefs;
00270         if (file && !generateClassInfo(className))
00271         {
00272                 return refDef;
00273         }
00274         else if (!file && !generateClassInfoFromDD(className))
00275         {
00276                 return refDef;
00277         }
00278         typedefs = "#include \"ClassInfo.h\"\n#include \"string\"\n#include \"Method.h\"\n#include \"Field.h\"\n";
00279         typedefs += "#include \"" + this->classN + ".h\"\n";
00280         string structinf = "extern \"C\"\n{\nstruct struct"+this->classN+"{\n";
00281         refDef += "ClassInfo get" + this->classN + "()\n{\nClassInfo classInfo;";
00282         refDef += ("\nclassInfo.setClassName(\"" + this->classN + "\");");
00283         refDef += ("\nclassInfo.setInstance(new " + this->classN + ");");
00284         refDef += ("\nclassInfo.setBase(\"" + this->bcvisib + " " + this->baseClassN + "\");");
00285         refDef += ("\nvector<Method> methVec;\nvector<Field> fldVec;\nMethod me;\nField f;\nmethMap meths;\n");
00286         refDef += ("args argu;\n");
00287         string publf, privf, protf ,publm, privm, protm;
00288         string meth,fld;
00289         size_t tes;
00290         if (this->pub.size() > 0)
00291         {
00292                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->pub.size(); i++)
00293                 {
00294                         if((tes=this->pub.at(i).find("("))!=string::npos && (tes=this->pub.at(i).find(")"))!=string::npos && this->pub.at(i).find("~")==string::npos)
00295                         {
00296                                 refDef += ("me.clear();\n");
00297                                 publm += this->pub.at(i);
00298                                 meth = this->pub.at(i);
00299                                 boost::replace_first(meth,";","");
00300                                 boost::replace_first(meth,"("," ");
00301                                 boost::replace_all(meth,","," ");
00302                                 boost::replace_first(meth,")"," ");
00303                                 strVec methp,methpm;
00304                                 boost::iter_split(methp, meth, boost::first_finder(" "));
00305                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < methp.size(); j++)
00306                                 {
00307                                         if(methp.at(j)!="")
00308                                                 methpm.push_back(methp.at(j));
00309                                 }
00310                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < methpm.size(); j++)
00311                                 {
00312                                         if(j==0)
00313                                         {
00314                                                 if(methpm.at(0)==this->classN)
00315                                                 {
00316                                                         refDef += ("me.setReturnType(\"Constructor\");\n");
00317                                                         refDef += ("me.setMethodName(\""+methpm.at(j)+"\");\n");
00318                                                 }
00319                                                 else
00320                                                 {
00321                                                         refDef += ("me.setReturnType(\""+methpm.at(j)+"\");\n");
00322                                                         //typedefs += ("typedef " + methpm.at(j) + " ");
00323                                                 }
00324                                         }
00325                                         else if(j==1 && methpm.at(0)!=this->classN)
00326                                         {
00327                                                 refDef += ("me.setMethodName(\""+methpm.at(j)+"\");\n");
00328                                                 //refDef += (this->classN + methpm.at(j)+" = &"+this->classN+"::"+methpm.at(j)+";\n");
00329                                                 //typedefs += ("("+this->classN+"::*" + this->classN + methpm.at(j) + ") (");
00330                                         }
00331                                         else if(methpm.at(j)!="")
00332                                         {
00333                                                 refDef += ("argu.push_back(\""+methpm.at(j)+"\");\n");
00334                                                 /*typedefs += methpm.at(j);
00335                                                 if(j!=methpm.size()-1)
00336                                                         typedefs += ",";*/
00337                                         }
00338                                 }
00339                                 /*if(methpm.at(0)!=this->classN)
00340                                         typedefs += ");\n";*/
00341                                 refDef += ("me.setArgumentTypes(argu);\n");
00342                                 refDef += ("if(me.getMethodName()!=\"\")\n{\nmethVec.push_back(me);\n}\n");
00343                         }
00344                         else if(this->pub.at(i).find("~")==string::npos)
00345                         {
00346                                 refDef += ("f.clear();\n");
00347                                 publf += this->pub.at(i);
00348                                 fld = this->pub.at(i);
00349                                 boost::replace_first(fld,";","");
00350                                 strVec fldp;
00351                                 boost::iter_split(fldp, fld, boost::first_finder(" "));
00352                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < fldp.size(); j++)
00353                                 {
00354                                         if(j==0)
00355                                         {
00356                                                 refDef += ("f.setType(\""+fldp.at(j)+"\");\n");
00357                                         }
00358                                         else if(j==1)
00359                                         {
00360                                                 refDef += ("f.setFieldName(\""+fldp.at(j)+"\");\n");
00361                                         }
00362                                 }
00363                                 if(fldp.size()==2)
00364                                         structinf += (fldp.at(0)+" "+fldp.at(1)+";\n");
00365                                 refDef += ("if(f.getFieldName()!=\"\")\n{\nfldVec.push_back(f);\n}\n");
00366                         }
00367                 }
00368         }
00369         if (this->pri.size() > 0)
00370         {
00371                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->pri.size(); i++)
00372                 {
00373                         if((tes=this->pri.at(i).find("("))!=string::npos && (tes=this->pri.at(i).find(")"))!=string::npos && this->pri.at(i).find("~")==string::npos)
00374                         {
00375                                 refDef += ("me.clear();\n");
00376                                 privm += this->pri.at(i);
00377                                 meth = this->pri.at(i);
00378                                 boost::replace_first(meth,";","");
00379                                 boost::replace_first(meth,"("," ");
00380                                 boost::replace_all(meth,","," ");
00381                                 boost::replace_first(meth,")"," ");
00382                                 strVec methp;
00383                                 boost::iter_split(methp, meth, boost::first_finder(" "));
00384                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < methp.size(); j++)
00385                                 {
00386                                         if(j==0)
00387                                         {
00388                                                 if(methp.at(0)==this->classN)
00389                                                 {
00390                                                         refDef += ("me.setReturnType(\"Constructor\");\n");
00391                                                         refDef += ("me.setMethodName(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
00392                                                 }
00393                                                 else
00394                                                         refDef += ("me.setReturnType(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
00395                                         }
00396                                         else if(j==1 && methp.at(0)!=this->classN)
00397                                         {
00398                                                 refDef += ("me.setMethodName(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
00399                                         }
00400                                         else if(methp.at(j)!="")
00401                                         {
00402                                                 refDef += ("argu.push_back(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
00403                                         }
00404                                 }
00405                                 refDef += ("me.setArgumentTypes(argu);\n");
00406                                 refDef += ("if(me.getMethodName()!=\"\")\n{\nmethVec.push_back(me);\n}\n");
00407                         }
00408                         else if(this->pri.at(i).find("~")==string::npos)
00409                         {
00410                                 refDef += ("f.clear();\n");
00411                                 privf += this->pri.at(i);
00412                                 fld = this->pri.at(i);
00413                                 boost::replace_first(fld,";","");
00414                                 strVec fldp;
00415                                 boost::iter_split(fldp, fld, boost::first_finder(" "));
00416                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < fldp.size(); j++)
00417                                 {
00418                                         if(j==0)
00419                                         {
00420                                                 refDef += ("f.setType(\""+fldp.at(j)+"\");\n");
00421                                         }
00422                                         else if(j==1)
00423                                         {
00424                                                 refDef += ("f.setFieldName(\""+fldp.at(j)+"\");\n");
00425                                         }
00426                                 }
00427                                 if(fldp.size()==2)
00428                                         structinf += (fldp.at(0)+" "+fldp.at(1)+";\n");
00429                                 refDef += ("if(f.getFieldName()!=\"\")\n{\nfldVec.push_back(f);\n}\n");
00430                         }
00431                 }
00432         }
00433         if (this->pro.size() > 0)
00434         {
00435                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->pro.size(); i++)
00436                 {
00437                         if((tes=this->pro.at(i).find("("))!=string::npos && (tes=this->pro.at(i).find(")"))!=string::npos && this->pro.at(i).find("~")==string::npos)
00438                         {
00439                                 refDef += ("me.clear();\n");
00440                                 protm += this->pro.at(i);
00441                                 meth = this->pro.at(i);
00442                                 boost::replace_first(meth,";","");
00443                                 boost::replace_first(meth,"("," ");
00444                                 boost::replace_all(meth,","," ");
00445                                 boost::replace_first(meth,")"," ");
00446                                 strVec methp;
00447                                 boost::iter_split(methp, meth, boost::first_finder(" "));
00448                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < methp.size(); j++)
00449                                 {
00450                                         if(j==0)
00451                                         {
00452                                                 if(methp.at(0)==this->classN)
00453                                                 {
00454                                                         refDef += ("me.setReturnType(\"Constructor\");\n");
00455                                                         refDef += ("me.setMethodName(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
00456                                                 }
00457                                                 else
00458                                                         refDef += ("me.setReturnType(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
00459                                         }
00460                                         else if(j==1 && methp.at(0)!=this->classN)
00461                                         {
00462                                                 refDef += ("me.setMethodName(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
00463                                         }
00464                                         else if(methp.at(j)!="")
00465                                         {
00466                                                 refDef += ("argu.push_back(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
00467                                         }
00468                                 }
00469                                 refDef += ("me.setArgumentTypes(argu);\n");
00470                                 refDef += ("if(me.getMethodName()!=\"\")\n{\nmethVec.push_back(me);\n}\n");
00471                         }
00472                         else if(this->pro.at(i).find("~")==string::npos)
00473                         {
00474                                 refDef += ("f.clear();\n");
00475                                 protf += this->pro.at(i);
00476                                 fld = this->pro.at(i);
00477                                 boost::replace_first(fld,";","");
00478                                 strVec fldp;
00479                                 boost::iter_split(fldp, fld, boost::first_finder(" "));
00480                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < fldp.size(); j++)
00481                                 {
00482                                         if(j==0)
00483                                         {
00484                                                 refDef += ("f.setType(\""+fldp.at(j)+"\");\n");
00485                                         }
00486                                         else if(j==1)
00487                                         {
00488                                                 refDef += ("f.setFieldName(\""+fldp.at(j)+"\");\n");
00489                                         }
00490                                 }
00491                                 if(fldp.size()==2)
00492                                         structinf += (fldp.at(0)+" "+fldp.at(1)+";\n");
00493                                 refDef += ("if(f.getFieldName()!=\"\")\n{\nfldVec.push_back(f);\n}\n");
00494                         }
00495                 }
00496         }
00497         //refDef += ("\nclassInfo.setMeths(meths);");
00498         //refDef += ("\nclassInfo.setMethods(methVec);");
00499         //refDef += ("\nclassInfo.setFields(fldVec);");
00500         refDef += "\nreturn classInfo;\n}\n";
00501         refDef += "}";
00502         structinf += "};\n";
00503         refDef = (typedefs + structinf + refDef);
00504         return refDef;
00505 }
00506 
00507 string Reflection::updateTemplateContextDefinition(string className, bool file)
00508 {
00509         string refDef;
00510         if (file && !generateClassInfo(className))
00511         {
00512                 return refDef;
00513         }
00514         else if (!file && !generateClassInfoFromDD(className))
00515         {
00516                 return refDef;
00517         }
00518         refDef = "#include \"ClassInfo.h\"\n#include \"string\"\n";
00519         refDef += "#include \"" + this->classN + ".h\"\n\n";
00520         refDef += "extern \"C\"\n{\nClassInfo get" + this->classN + "()\n{\nClassInfo classInfo;";
00521         refDef += ("\nclassInfo.setInstance(new " + this->classN + ");");
00522         refDef += "\nreturn classInfo;\n}\n}";
00523         return refDef;
00524 }

00526 
00527 propMap Reflection::getDbTableInfo(string file)
00528 {
00529         propMap tabInfo;
00530         string temp;
00531         strVec all;
00532         ifstream infile;
00533         infile.open(file.c_str());
00534         if(infile)
00535         {
00536                 while(getline(infile,temp))
00537                 {
00538                         if(temp!="")
00539                                 all.push_back(temp);
00540                 }
00541                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<(all.size()/2);i++)
00542                 {
00543                         tabInfo[all.at(i)] = all.at(i+1);
00544                 }
00545         }
00546         return tabInfo;
00547 }
00548 
00549 strVec Reflection::getAfcObjectData(string className,bool object)
00550 {
00551         strVec refDef;
00552         if (!generateClassInfo(className))
00553         {
00554                 return refDef;
00555         }
00556         strVec publf, privf, protf ,publm, privm, protm;
00557 
00558         size_t tes;
00559         if (this->pub.size() > 0)
00560         {
00561                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->pub.size(); i++)
00562                 {
00563                         if((tes=this->pub.at(i).find("("))!=string::npos && (tes=this->pub.at(i).find(")"))!=string::npos)
00564                         {
00565                                 publm.push_back(this->pub.at(i));
00566                         }
00567                         else
00568                         {
00569                                 publf.push_back(this->pub.at(i));
00570                         }
00571                 }
00572         }
00573         if (this->pri.size() > 0)
00574         {
00575                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->pri.size(); i++)
00576                 {
00577                         if((tes=this->pri.at(i).find("("))!=string::npos && (tes=this->pri.at(i).find(")"))!=string::npos)
00578                         {
00579                                 privm.push_back(this->pri.at(i));
00580                         }
00581                 }
00582         }
00583         if (this->pro.size() > 0)
00584         {
00585                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->pro.size(); i++)
00586                 {
00587                         if((tes=this->pro.at(i).find("("))!=string::npos && (tes=this->pro.at(i).find(")"))!=string::npos)
00588                         {
00589                                 protm.push_back(this->pro.at(i));
00590                         }
00591                 }
00592         }
00593         if(!object)
00594         {
00595                 return publm;
00596         }
00597         else
00598         {
00599                 return publf;
00600         }
00601 }
00602 
00603 string Reflection::generateClassDefinitionsAll(strVec all,string &includeRef)
00604 {
00605         string ret = "";
00606         //includeRef = "#ifndef REFLECTOR_H_\n#define REFLECTOR_H_\n#include \"ClassInfo.h\"\n#include \"string\"\n#include \"Method.h\"\n#include \"Field.h\"\n#include \"Trace.h\"\n";
00607         //includeRef += "#include \"XmlParser.h\"\n#include <stdio.h>\n#include <sys/wait.h>\n#include <stdexcept>\n#include <execinfo.h>\n#include <dlfcn.h>\n#include <cxxabi.h>\n#include <stdio.h>\n#include <stdlib.h>\n#include \"string\"\n#include <sstream>\n#include <typeinfo>\n";
00608         string typedefs,classes,methods,opers;
00609         string inc = "#include \"ClassInfo.h\"\n#include \"string\"\n#include \"Method.h\"\n#include \"Field.h\"\n";
00610         ret += "extern \"C\"\n{\n";
00611         for (unsigned int var = 0; var < all.size(); ++var)
00612         {
00613                 cout << "\nstarting for classes " << all.size() << "\n" << flush;
00614                 ret += this->generateClassDefinitions(all.at(var),inc,typedefs,classes,methods,opers);
00615 
00616         }
00617         /*ret += "ClassInfo Reflector::getClassInfo(string className)\n{\n";
00618         ret += classes;
00619         ret += "\n\treturn info;\n}\n";

00621         ret += methods;
00622         ret += "\n\treturn returnValue;\n}\n";
00623         ret += "bool Reflector::instanceOf(void* instance,string className)\n{\n";
00624         ret += "Trace tr;\nstring cn = tr.getClassName(instance);\nif(cn==className)\nreturn true;\nelse\nreturn false;\n}\n";*/
00625         ret +=  methods+opers+ "\n}\n";
00626         ret = (inc+ret);
00627         return ret;
00628 }
00629 
00630 string Reflection::generateClassDefinitions(string includeDir,string &includesDefs,string &typedefs,string &classes,string &methods,string &opers)
00631 {
00632         strVec includes = list(includeDir);
00633         string ret,in,ty,cl,me;
00634         for (unsigned int var = 0; var < includes.size(); ++var)
00635         {
00636                 cout << "\ngenerating for file" << includes.at(var) << "\n" << flush;
00637                 ret += generateClassDefinition(includes.at(var),includesDefs,typedefs,classes,methods,opers);
00638                 cout << "\ndone generating for file" << includes.at(var) << "\n" << flush;
00639         }
00640         return ret;
00641 }
00642 
00643 string Reflection::generateClassDefinition(string className,string &includesDefs,string &typedefs,string &classes,string &methods,string &opers)
00644 {
00645         string refDef;
00646         if (!generateClassInfo(className))
00647         {
00648                 return refDef;
00649         }
00650         classes += "\tif(className==\""+this->classN+"\")\n\t\treturn get"+this->classN+"();\n";
00651         includesDefs += "#include \"" + this->classN + ".h\"\n";
00652         //string structinf = "\nstruct struct"+this->classN+"{\n";
00653         refDef += "ClassInfo getReflectionCIFor" + this->classN + "()\n{\nClassInfo classInfo;";
00654         refDef += ("\nclassInfo.setClassName(\"" + this->classN + "\");");
00655         //refDef += ("\nclassInfo.setInstance(new " + this->classN + ");");
00656         refDef += ("\nclassInfo.setBase(\"" + this->bcvisib + " " + this->baseClassN + "\");");
00657         refDef += ("\nConstructor ctor;\nMethod me;\nField f;\n");
00658         refDef += ("args argu;\n");
00659         string publf, privf, protf ,publm, privm, protm;
00660         string meth,fld;
00661         size_t tes;
00662         bool ctorisp = false,ddtorisp = false;;
00663         if (this->pub.size() > 0)
00664         {
00665                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->pub.size(); i++)
00666                 {
00667                         if((tes=this->pub.at(i).find("("))!=string::npos && (tes=this->pub.at(i).find(")"))!=string::npos && this->pub.at(i).find("~")==string::npos)
00668                         {
00669                                 refDef += ("ctor.clear();\nme.clear();\n");
00670                                 publm += this->pub.at(i);
00671                                 meth = this->pub.at(i);
00672                                 boost::replace_first(meth,";","");
00673 
00674                                 string argts = meth.substr(meth.find("("),meth.find(")")-meth.find("("));
00675                                 boost::replace_first(argts,"(","");
00676                                 boost::replace_all(argts,")","");
00677                                 meth = meth.substr(0,meth.find("("));
00678                                 //boost::replace_first(meth,")"," ");
00679                                 strVec methp,methpm,argp,argpm;
00680                                 boost::iter_split(argp, argts, boost::first_finder(","));
00681                                 boost::iter_split(methp, meth, boost::first_finder(" "));
00682                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < methp.size(); j++)
00683                                 {
00684                                         if(methp.at(j)!="")
00685                                                 methpm.push_back(methp.at(j));
00686                                 }
00687                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < argp.size(); j++)
00688                                 {
00689                                         if(argp.at(j)!="" && argp.at(j)!="(")
00690                                                 argpm.push_back(argp.at(j));
00691                                 }
00692                                 string typdefName,methsd,valsd,valsa;
00693                                 //bool ctor = false;
00694                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < methpm.size(); j++)
00695                                 {
00696                                         if(j==0)
00697                                         {
00698                                                 if(methpm.at(0)==this->classN)
00699                                                 {
00700                                                         refDef += ("ctor.setName(\""+this->classN+"\");\n");
00701                                                         //refDef += ("me.setMethodName(\""+this->classN+methpm.at(j)+"\");\n");
00702                                                         //ctor = true;
00703                                                         methsd += (this->classN);
00704                                                 }
00705                                                 else if(meth.find(" operator")==string::npos)
00706                                                 {
00707                                                         refDef += ("me.setReturnType(\""+methpm.at(j)+"\");\n");
00708                                                         typedefs += ("typedef " + methpm.at(j) + " ");
00709                                                 }
00710                                         }
00711                                         else if(j==1 && methpm.at(0)!=this->classN && meth.find(" operator")==string::npos)
00712                                         {
00713 
00714                                                 //refDef += (this->classN + methpm.at(j)+" = &"+this->classN+"::"+methpm.at(j)+";\n");
00715                                                 typedefs += ("("+this->classN+"::*"+this->classN +methpm.at(j));
00716                                                 methsd += (this->classN+methpm.at(j));
00717                                         }
00718                                         /*else if(methpm.at(j)!="")
00719                                         {
00720                                                 refDef += ("argu.push_back(\""+methpm.at(j)+"\");\n");

00722                                                 valsa += "*_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(j-1);
00723                                                 if(methpm.at(0)!=this->classN)
00724                                                 {
00725                                                         typedefs += methpm.at(j);
00726                                                         typdefName += methpm.at(j);
00727                                                         methsd += methpm.at(j);
00728                                                         if(j!=methpm.size()-1)

00745                                         boost::replace_all(argtn.at(0)," ","");

00748                                         {

00751                                         }
00752                                         else if(argtn.at(0).find("&")!=string::npos || type12=="&")
00753                                         {
00754                                                 boost::replace_all(argtn.at(0),"&","");
00755                                                 valsd += "\t\t"+(argtn.at(0) + " *_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(j)+" = ("+argtn.at(0)+"*)values.at("+boost::lexical_cast<string>(j)+");");
00756                                         }
00757                                         else
00758                                                 valsd += "\t\t"+(argtn.at(0) + " *_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(j)+" = ("+argtn.at(0)+"*)values.at("+boost::lexical_cast<string>(j)+");");

01036                                                 refDef += ("if(me.getMethodName()!=\"\")\n{\nclassInfo.addMethod(me);\n}\n");
01037                                         }
01038                                         else
01039                                         {
01040                                                 typedefs += (") ("+typdefName+");\n");
01041                                                 methods += "\nvoid* invokeReflectionCICtorFor"+methsd+"(vals values)\n{";
01042                                                 methods += "\n\t"+this->classN+" *_retVal = NULL;\n";
01043                                                 methods += valsd;
01044                                                 methods += "\n\t_retVal = (new "+this->classN+"("+valsa+"));";
01045                                                 methods += "\n\treturn _retVal;";
01046                                                 methods += "\n}";
01047                                                 refDef += ("ctor.setName(\""+methsd+"\");\n");
01048                                                 refDef += ("ctor.setArgumentTypes(argu);\n");
01049                                                 refDef += ("argu.clear();\n");
01050                                                 refDef += ("classInfo.addConstructor(ctor);\n");
01051                                                 ctorisp = true;
01052                                         }
01053                                 }
01054                         }
01055                         else if(this->pub.at(i).find("~")==string::npos)
01056                         {
01057                                 refDef += ("f.clear();\n");
01058                                 publf += this->pub.at(i);
01059                                 fld = this->pub.at(i);
01060                                 boost::replace_first(fld,";","");
01061                                 strVec fldp;
01062                                 boost::iter_split(fldp, fld, boost::first_finder(" "));
01063                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < fldp.size(); j++)
01064                                 {
01065                                         if(j==0)
01066                                         {
01067                                                 refDef += ("f.setType(\""+fldp.at(j)+"\");\n");
01068                                         }
01069                                         else if(j==1)
01070                                         {
01071                                                 refDef += ("f.setFieldName(\""+fldp.at(j)+"\");\n");
01072                                         }
01073                                 }
01074                                 //if(fldp.size()==2)
01075                                 //      structinf += (fldp.at(0)+" "+fldp.at(1)+";\n");
01076                                 methods += "\n"+fldp.at(0)+" invokeReflectionCIFieldFor"+this->classN+fldp.at(1)+"(void* instance)\n{\n\t"+this->classN+" *_obj = ("+this->classN+"*)instance;\n\treturn _obj->"+fldp.at(1)+";\n}\n";
01077                                 refDef += ("if(f.getFieldName()!=\"\")\n{\nclassInfo.addField(f);\n}\n");
01078                         }
01079                         else if(this->pub.at(i).find("~")!=string::npos)
01080                         {
01081                                 methods += "\nvoid invokeReflectionCIDtorFor"+this->classN+"(void* instance)\n{";
01082                                 methods += "\n\t"+this->classN+" *_obj = ("+this->classN+"*)instance;\n\t";
01083                                 methods += "_obj->~"+this->classN+"();";
01084                                 methods += "\n}";
01085                                 ddtorisp = true;
01086                         }
01087                 }
01088                 if(!ctorisp)
01089                 {
01090                         refDef += ("ctor.setName(\""+this->classN+"\");\n");
01091                         refDef += ("argu.clear();\n");
01092                         methods += "\nvoid* invokeReflectionCICtorFor"+this->classN+"(vals values)\n{";
01093                         methods += "\n\t"+this->classN+" *_retVal = NULL;\n";
01094                         methods += "\n\t_retVal = (new "+this->classN+"());";
01095                         methods += "\n\treturn _retVal;";
01096                         methods += "\n}";
01097                         refDef += ("ctor.setArgumentTypes(argu);\n");
01098                         refDef += ("argu.clear();\n");
01099                         refDef += ("classInfo.addConstructor(ctor);\n");
01100                 }
01101                 if(!ddtorisp)
01102                 {
01103                         methods += "\nvoid invokeReflectionCIDtorFor"+this->classN+"(void* instance)\n{";
01104                         methods += "\n\t"+this->classN+" *_obj = ("+this->classN+"*)instance;\n\t";
01105                         methods += "_obj->~"+this->classN+"();";
01106                         methods += "\n}";
01107                         ddtorisp = true;
01108                 }
01109         }
01110         if (this->pri.size() > 0)
01111         {
01112                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->pri.size(); i++)
01113                 {
01114                         if((tes=this->pri.at(i).find("("))!=string::npos && (tes=this->pri.at(i).find(")"))!=string::npos && this->pri.at(i).find("~")==string::npos)
01115                         {
01116                                 //refDef += ("me.clear();\n");
01117                                 privm += this->pri.at(i);
01118                                 meth = this->pri.at(i);
01119                                 boost::replace_first(meth,";","");
01120                                 boost::replace_first(meth,"("," ");
01121                                 boost::replace_all(meth,","," ");
01122                                 boost::replace_first(meth,")"," ");
01123                                 strVec methp;
01124                                 boost::iter_split(methp, meth, boost::first_finder(" "));
01125                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < methp.size(); j++)
01126                                 {
01127                                         if(j==0)
01128                                         {
01129                                                 if(methp.at(0)==this->classN)
01130                                                 {
01131                                                         //refDef += ("me.setReturnType(\"Constructor\");\n");
01132                                                         //refDef += ("me.setMethodName(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
01133                                                 }
01134                                                 else
01135                                                 {
01136                                                         //refDef += ("me.setReturnType(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
01137                                                 }
01138                                         }
01139                                         else if(j==1 && methp.at(0)!=this->classN)
01140                                         {
01141                                                 //refDef += ("me.setMethodName(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
01142                                         }
01143                                         else if(methp.at(j)!="")
01144                                         {
01145                                                 //refDef += ("argu.push_back(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
01146                                         }
01147                                 }
01148                                 //refDef += ("me.setArgumentTypes(argu);\n");
01149                                 //refDef += ("if(me.getMethodName()!=\"\")\n{\nmethVec.push_back(me);\n}\n");
01150                         }
01151                         else if(this->pri.at(i).find("~")==string::npos)
01152                         {
01153                                 refDef += ("f.clear();\n");
01154                                 privf += this->pri.at(i);
01155                                 fld = this->pri.at(i);
01156                                 boost::replace_first(fld,";","");
01157                                 strVec fldp;
01158                                 boost::iter_split(fldp, fld, boost::first_finder(" "));
01159                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < fldp.size(); j++)
01160                                 {
01161                                         if(j==0)
01162                                         {
01163                                                 refDef += ("f.setType(\""+fldp.at(j)+"\");\n");
01164                                         }
01165                                         else if(j==1)
01166                                         {
01167                                                 refDef += ("f.setFieldName(\""+fldp.at(j)+"\");\n");
01168                                         }
01169                                 }
01170                                 //if(fldp.size()==2)
01171                                 //      structinf += (fldp.at(0)+" "+fldp.at(1)+";\n");
01172                                 //methods += "\n"+fldp.at(0)+" invokeReflectionCIFieldFor"+this->classN+fldp.at(1)+"(void* instance)\n{\n\t"+this->classN+" *_obj = ("+this->classN+"*)instance;\nstruct"
01173                                 //+this->classN+" *__obj=(struct"+this->classN+"*)_obj;\n\treturn __obj->"+fldp.at(1)+";\n}\n";
01174                                 refDef += ("if(f.getFieldName()!=\"\")\n{\nclassInfo.addField(f);\n}\n");
01175                         }
01176                 }
01177         }
01178         if (this->pro.size() > 0)
01179         {
01180                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->pro.size(); i++)
01181                 {
01182                         if((tes=this->pro.at(i).find("("))!=string::npos && (tes=this->pro.at(i).find(")"))!=string::npos && this->pro.at(i).find("~")==string::npos)
01183                         {
01184                                 //refDef += ("me.clear();\n");
01185                                 protm += this->pro.at(i);
01186                                 meth = this->pro.at(i);
01187                                 boost::replace_first(meth,";","");
01188                                 boost::replace_first(meth,"("," ");
01189                                 boost::replace_all(meth,","," ");
01190                                 boost::replace_first(meth,")"," ");
01191                                 strVec methp;
01192                                 boost::iter_split(methp, meth, boost::first_finder(" "));
01193                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < methp.size(); j++)
01194                                 {
01195                                         if(j==0)
01196                                         {
01197                                                 if(methp.at(0)==this->classN)
01198                                                 {
01199                                                         //refDef += ("me.setReturnType(\"Constructor\");\n");
01200                                                         //refDef += ("me.setMethodName(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
01201                                                 }
01202                                                 else
01203                                                 {
01204                                                         //refDef += ("me.setReturnType(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
01205                                                 }
01206                                         }
01207                                         else if(j==1 && methp.at(0)!=this->classN)
01208                                         {
01209                                                 //refDef += ("me.setMethodName(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
01210                                         }
01211                                         else if(methp.at(j)!="")
01212                                         {
01213                                                 //refDef += ("argu.push_back(\""+methp.at(j)+"\");\n");
01214                                         }
01215                                 }
01216                                 //refDef += ("me.setArgumentTypes(argu);\n");
01217                                 //refDef += ("if(me.getMethodName()!=\"\")\n{\nmethVec.push_back(me);\n}\n");
01218                         }
01219                         else if(this->pro.at(i).find("~")==string::npos)
01220                         {
01221                                 refDef += ("f.clear();\n");
01222                                 protf += this->pro.at(i);
01223                                 fld = this->pro.at(i);
01224                                 boost::replace_first(fld,";","");
01225                                 strVec fldp;
01226                                 boost::iter_split(fldp, fld, boost::first_finder(" "));
01227                                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < fldp.size(); j++)
01228                                 {
01229                                         if(j==0)
01230                                         {
01231                                                 refDef += ("f.setType(\""+fldp.at(j)+"\");\n");
01232                                         }
01233                                         else if(j==1)
01234                                         {
01235                                                 refDef += ("f.setFieldName(\""+fldp.at(j)+"\");\n");
01236                                         }

01238                                 //if(fldp.size()==2)
01239                                 //      structinf += (fldp.at(0)+" "+fldp.at(1)+";\n");
01240                                 //methods += "\n"+fldp.at(0)+" invokeReflectionCIFieldFor"+this->classN+fldp.at(1)+"(void* instance)\n{\n\t"+this->classN+" *_obj = ("+this->classN+"*)instance;\nstruct"
01241                                 //+this->classN+" *__obj=(struct"+this->classN+"*)_obj;\n\treturn __obj->"+fldp.at(1)+";\n}\n";
01242                                 refDef += ("if(f.getFieldName()!=\"\")\n{\nclassInfo.addField(f);\n}\n");
01243                         }
01244                 }
01245         }
01246         //refDef += ("\nclassInfo.setMeths(meths);");
01247         //refDef += ("\nclassInfo.setMethods(methVec);");
01248         //refDef += ("\nclassInfo.setFields(fldVec);");
01249         refDef += "\nreturn classInfo;\n}\n";
01250         refDef += "\nvoid invokeAdToVecFor"+this->classN+"(void* _vec,void* _instance){"+this->classN+" *_obj = ("+this->classN+"*)_instance;vector<"+this->classN+"> *_objvec = (vector<"+this->classN+"> *)_vec;_objvec->push_back(*_obj);}";

01253         refDef += "\nvoid* invokeGetVecElementFor"+this->classN+"(void* _vec,int pos){vector<"+this->classN+"> *_objvec = (vector<"+this->classN+">*)_vec;return &(_objvec->at(pos));}";
01254         //refDef = (structinf+"};\n"+refDef);
01255         return refDef;
01256 }
01257 
01258 string Reflection::generateSerDefinitionAll(strVec all,string &includeRef)
01259 {
01260         string ret = "#include \"XmlParser.h\"\n#include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>\n";
01261         includeRef = "#include \"Reflector.h\"\n#include \"Trace.h\"\n#include \"vector\"\n#include \"list\"\n#include \"queue\"\n#include \"deque\"\n#include \"set\"\n#include \"DateFormat.h\"\n" ;
01262         string typedefs,classes,methods,rert1;
01263         for (unsigned int var = 0; var < all.size(); ++var)
01264         {
01265                 rert1 += this->generateSerDefinitions(all.at(var),includeRef,typedefs,classes,methods);
01266 
01267         }
01268         includeRef += ("extern \"C\"{\n" + classes + typedefs + methods);
01269         ret += includeRef;
01270         /*ret += "\npublic:\ntemplate <class T> string serialize(T t)\n{\nstring objXml;\n";
01271         ret += "string className;\nint status;\nconst char *mangled = typeid(t).name();\nusing namespace abi;\nmangled = __cxa_demangle(mangled, NULL, 0, &status);\nstringstream ss;\nss << mangled;\nss >> className;";
01272         ret += classes;
01273         ret += "\n\treturn objXml;\n}\n";
01274         ret += "template <class T> T unSerialize(string objXml)\n{\nT t;\nstring className;\nint status;\nconst char *mangled = typeid(t).name();\nusing namespace abi;\nmangled = __cxa_demangle(mangled, NULL, 0, &status);\nstringstream ss;\nss << mangled;\nss >> className;\n";
01275         ret += rert1;
01276         ret += "\n\treturn t;\n}\n";
01277         ret += "}\n";*/
01278         ret += "}\n";
01279         includeRef += typedefs;
01280         return ret;
01281 }
01282 
01283 string Reflection::generateSerDefinitions(string includeDir,string &includesDefs,string &typedefs,string &classes,string &methods)
01284 {
01285         strVec includes = list(includeDir);
01286         string ret;
01287         for (unsigned int var = 0; var < includes.size(); ++var)
01288         {
01289                 cout << "\ngenerating Ser for file" << includes.at(var) << "\n" << flush;
01290                 ret += generateSerDefinition(includes.at(var),includesDefs,typedefs,classes,methods);
01291                 cout << "\ndone generating Ser for file" << includes.at(var) << "\n" << flush;
01292         }
01293         return ret;
01294 }
01295 
01296 string Reflection::generateSerDefinition(string className,string &includesDefs,string &typedefs,string &classes,string &methods)
01297 {
01298         string refDef;
01299         string opers;
01300         if (!generateClassInfo(className))
01301         {
01302                 return refDef;
01303         }
01304         prosetser = false;
01305         //classes += "\tif(className==\""+this->classN+"\")\n\t\tobjXml = get"+this->classN+"XML(t);\n";
01306         refDef += "\tif(className==\""+this->classN+"\")\n\t\tt = getObject"+this->classN+"(objXml);\n";
01307         includesDefs += "#include \"" + this->classN + ".h\"\n";
01308         //string structinf = "\nstruct struct"+this->classN+"{\n";
01309         classes += "\nstring serialize" + this->classN + "(void* obje);\nvoid* unSerialize" + this->classN + "(string objXml);";
01310         methods += "\nstring serialize" + this->classN + "(void* obje)\n{\n"+this->classN+" *__obj=("+this->classN+"*)obje;\n";
01311         methods += "string objxml = \"<"+this->classN+">\";\n";
01312         typedefs += "\nvoid* unSerialize" + this->classN + "(string objXml)\n{\n";
01313         typedefs += this->classN+" *__obj=new "+this->classN+";\nXmlParser parser(\"Parser\");\nElement root=parser.getDocument(objXml).getRootElement();\n";
01314         typedefs += "for(unsigned int i=0;i<root.getChildElements().size();i++)\n{\n";
01315         typedefs += "string nam=root.getChildElements().at(i).getTagName();\n";
01316 
01317         string publf, privf, protf ,publm, privm, protm;
01318         string meth,fld;
01319         size_t tes;
01320         strVec fldnames;
01321         if (this->pri.size() > 0)
01322         {
01323                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->pri.size(); i++)
01324                 {
01325                         if(((tes=this->pri.at(i).find("("))==string::npos && (tes=this->pri.at(i).find(")"))==string::npos && this->pri.at(i).find("~")==string::npos))
01326                         {
01327                                 fld = this->pri.at(i);
01328                                 boost::replace_first(fld,";","");
01329                                 strVec fldp;
01330                                 boost::iter_split(fldp, fld, boost::first_finder(" "));
01331                                 if(fldp.size()==2)
01332                                 {
01333                                         string nam = fldp.at(1);
01334                                         fldnames.push_back(fldp.at(0));
01335                                         fldnames.push_back(nam);
01336                                 }
01337                         }
01338                 }
01339         }
01340         if (this->pro.size() > 0)
01341         {
01342                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->pro.size(); i++)
01343                 {
01344                         if(((tes=this->pro.at(i).find("("))==string::npos && (tes=this->pro.at(i).find(")"))==string::npos && this->pro.at(i).find("~")==string::npos))
01345                         {
01346                                 fld = this->pro.at(i);
01347                                 boost::replace_first(fld,";","");
01348                                 strVec fldp;
01349                                 boost::iter_split(fldp, fld, boost::first_finder(" "));
01350                                 if(fldp.size()==2)
01351                                 {
01352                                         string nam = fldp.at(1);
01353                                         fldnames.push_back(fldp.at(0));
01354                                         fldnames.push_back(nam);
01355                                 }
01356                         }
01357                 }
01358         }
01359         if (this->pub.size() > 0)
01360         {
01361                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->pub.size(); i++)
01362                 {
01363                         if(((tes=this->pub.at(i).find("("))==string::npos && (tes=this->pub.at(i).find(")"))==string::npos && this->pub.at(i).find("~")==string::npos))
01364                         {
01365                                 fld = this->pub.at(i);
01366                                 boost::replace_first(fld,";","");
01367                                 strVec fldp;
01368                                 boost::iter_split(fldp, fld, boost::first_finder(" "));
01369                                 if(fldp.size()==2)
01370                                 {
01371                                         string nam = fldp.at(1);
01372                                         if(fldp.at(0)=="int" || fldp.at(0)=="float" || fldp.at(0)=="string" || fldp.at(0)=="double" || fldp.at(0)=="bool")
01373                                         {
01374                                                 methods += ("objxml += \"<"+fldp.at(1)+" type=\\\""+fldp.at(0)+"\\\">\"+boost::lexical_cast<string>(__obj->"+fldp.at(1)+")");
01375                                                 string cam = AfcUtil::camelCased(fldp.at(1));
01376                                                 methods += ("+\"</"+nam+">\";\n");
01377                                                 typedefs += "if(nam==\""+fldp.at(1)+"\")\n__obj->"+fldp.at(1)+" = boost::lexical_cast<"+fldp.at(0)+">(root.getChildElements().at(i).getText());\n";
01378                                         }
01379                                         else if(fldp.at(0)=="Date")
01380                                         {
01381                                                 methods += ("DateFormat formt"+fldp.at(1)+"(\"yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss\");\nobjxml += \"<"+fldp.at(1)+" type=\\\""+fldp.at(0)+"\\\">\"+formt"+fldp.at(1)+".format(__obj->"+fldp.at(1)+")");
01382                                                 string cam = AfcUtil::camelCased(fldp.at(1));
01383                                                 methods += ("+\"</"+nam+">\";\n");
01384                                                 typedefs += "if(nam==\""+fldp.at(1)+"\")\n{\nDateFormat formt"+fldp.at(1)+"(\"yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss\");\n__obj->"+fldp.at(1)+" = *(formt"+fldp.at(1)+".parse(root.getChildElements().at(i).getText()));\n}\n";
01385                                         }
01386                                         else if(fldp.at(0)=="BinaryData")
01387                                         {
01388                                                 methods += ("objxml += \"<"+fldp.at(1)+" type=\\\""+fldp.at(0)+"\\\">\"+BinaryData::serilaize(__obj->"+fldp.at(1)+")");
01389                                                 string cam = AfcUtil::camelCased(fldp.at(1));
01390                                                 methods += ("+\"</"+nam+">\";\n");
01391                                                 typedefs += "if(nam==\""+fldp.at(1)+"\")\n__obj->"+fldp.at(1)+" = *(BinaryData::unSerilaize(root.getChildElements().at(i).getText()));\n";
01392                                         }
01393                                         else if(fldp.at(0).find("vector")!=string::npos || fldp.at(0).find("queue")!=string::npos || fldp.at(0).find("deque")!=string::npos || fldp.at(0).find("set")!=string::npos || fldp.at(0).find("list")!=string::npos)
01394                                         {
01395                                                 string stlcnt = fldp.at(0);
01396                                                 string stltyp = fldp.at(0);
01397                                                 boost::replace_first(stltyp,"<","::");
01398                                                 boost::replace_first(stltyp,">","");
01399                                                 boost::replace_first(stltyp," ","");
01400                                                 string stlcnttyp = "";
01401                                                 if(fldp.at(0).find("vector")!=string::npos)
01402                                                         stlcnttyp = "Vec";
01403                                                 else if(fldp.at(0).find("vector")!=string::npos)
01404                                                         stlcnttyp = "Q";
01405                                                 else if(fldp.at(0).find("vector")!=string::npos)
01406                                                         stlcnttyp = "Dq";
01407                                                 else if(fldp.at(0).find("vector")!=string::npos)
01408                                                         stlcnttyp = "Lis";
01409                                                 else
01410                                                         stlcnttyp = "Set";
01411                                                 boost::replace_first(stlcnt,"vector","");
01412                                                 boost::replace_first(stlcnt,"queue","");
01413                                                 boost::replace_first(stlcnt,"deque","");
01414                                                 boost::replace_first(stlcnt,"set","");
01415                                                 boost::replace_first(stlcnt,"list","");
01416                                                 boost::replace_first(stlcnt,"<","");
01417                                                 boost::replace_first(stlcnt,">","");
01418                                                 boost::replace_first(stlcnt," ","");
01419 
01420                                                 methods += (fldp.at(0)+" __temp_obj_ser = __obj->"+fldp.at(1)+";\n");
01421                                                 methods += ("objxml += \"<"+fldp.at(1)+" type=\\\""+stltyp+"\\\">\"+serialize"+stlcnt+stlcnttyp+"(&__temp_obj_ser)");
01422                                                 string cam = AfcUtil::camelCased(fldp.at(1));
01423                                                 methods += ("+\"</"+nam+">\";\n");
01424                                                 typedefs += "if(nam==\""+fldp.at(1)+"\")\n__obj->"+fldp.at(1)+" = *("+fldp.at(0)+"*)unSerialize"+stlcnt+stlcnttyp+"(root.getChildElements().at(i).renderChildren());\n";
01425                                         }
01426                                         else
01427                                         {
01428                                                 methods += (fldp.at(0)+" __temp_obj_ser = __obj->"+fldp.at(1)+";\n");
01429                                                 methods += ("objxml += \"<"+fldp.at(1)+" type=\\\""+fldp.at(0)+"\\\">\"+serialize"+fldp.at(0)+"(&__temp_obj_ser)");
01430                                                 string cam = AfcUtil::camelCased(fldp.at(1));
01431                                                 methods += ("+\"</"+nam+">\";\n");
01432                                                 typedefs += "if(nam==\""+fldp.at(1)+"\")\n__obj->"+fldp.at(1)+" = *("+fldp.at(0)+"*)unSerialize"+fldp.at(0)+"(root.getChildElements().at(i).renderChildren());\n";
01433                                         }
